tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was an emergency! My tooth was really hurting. Doctor was prompt and very patiently exploring probable possibilities of pain. 
Very efficient and proper with her diagnosis. Everything explained and done smoothly and efficiently. 
I will be taking my daughter for her braces there soon.

I'm from Melbourne Australia and I visited Mumbai for the past few weeks to explore & determine which dental clinic can provide my mother with the most professional treatment for an All on Four Dental implants. From the moment I entered the Aesthetic Smile Dental Clinic I was introduced to Dr Ritika Arora. My 1st impression was the cleanliness and the fitoutis modern with the latest technology & dental equipment. Her professional approach together with her overwhelming credentials made me feel at ease immediately. She explained the complete process from start to finish from the moment you arrive in India till the day you depart. She will then sit down and explain the complete treatment plan and the costs involved so that there are no hidden surprises. Not many clinics have this credential. My mother will get her treatment  in August and I have no hesitation that this will be a great success. If you are considering dental treatment abroad then this clinic has to on top of your priority list. You may be surprised how affordable it is.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
So with a broken bridge not sure what to do as my previous dentist had shifted base to another city . so google comes to your rescue as usual and was looking for good dental clinic. Came across Aesthetic Dental Clinic, a quick appointment, limited wait and Detailed analysis by Dr. Ritika Arora , who actually matched reviews on google , was very professional at her work and suggested me for implants . 
So I had three extracts and 3 dental implants on the same day sounds scary but the procedure was painless though some discomforts for few days but that‚Äôs a natural. After 4 months the implants were restored with 4 ceramic crowns. And so now I can eat .
Modern clinic , very professional , affordable and the overall experience at Aesthetic smiles dental clinic is good especially for nervous patients like me who tend to neglect dental treatment 
Highly recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited for dental implants 
Was looking for a good dental clinic in mumbai , found Dr Ritika online and was quite impressed with her credentials and the reviews on google 
I was struggling with a old broken bridge with missing teeth . On Consultation with Dr Ritika suggested me immediate dental implants.
I had 3 teeth extracted and 3 dental implants place on the same day . The procedure was painless though there was some nagging discomfort for a few days later which is quite normal when you have so much dental work done in one sitting 
After 4 months the dental implants were restored with 4 ceramic crowns. I happy to be back to enjoying my food.
Modern clinic , very professional , affordable and the overall experience at Aesthetic smiles dental clinic is good especially for nervous patients like me who tend to neglect dental treatment 
Highly recommended

The facilities are good & top notch therefore the2 stars. Commend & appreciate that.
This is specifically about dentist Dr Ritika Arora:
Was looking for a good doctor who inspires confidence.
Disclaimer: I have this distrust for doctors.
Here again got a confirmation, & I know I am right!
Dr Ritika is probably great as a dentist, but, I found her very insensitive * ********* ***** ***** **** ******* ********** * ** * ********** *** ******* ***** **** ****
She did what I needed *** ******* ** ***** *********** ** ********** ***** * *** ****** ********* which I expected & she was probably right.
But, she should realise that we pay hard earned money & a doctor-patient relationship is a fiduciary relation & goes way into the future once cultivated
She made me feel so uncomfortable & even after I was done & paid for the treatment at the reception desk,  she actually scowled when I asked about the post treatment ( it was just the filling of a cavity) !!! That was the last straw and lworst part of a bad experience & the gist of this review!
** ******* *** *** * ******* * ******* *** ****** ***** ******* **** ***** We pay for the services, Very disappointed & there is no way  I would ever go back. So sad, *** ************ ********Don‚Äôt expect free services, but do expect fair * **** treatment at humane level!

I had come to the clinic yesterday for a routine check up and cleaning of my teeth. I had visited the clinic once before and was really satisfied so I came back. But this time I was not really happy as I wanted to clean my teeth which was done but the teeth polishing was not done and also I was charged 1800rs which I feel is too expensive for cleaning of teeth and no polishing as far as I remember the last time I paid was 500 Rs and Dr Ritika was really professional with explaining in details of my dental health. I hope you discuss the charges before hand so patient are mentally prepared .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Writing this after 8 months of my treatment and I have no post treatment problems. I was skeptical at start since I didn't knew about Dr. Ritika and read only the reviews on Practo and decided to make a visit. I stay around 20Kms away from clinic and travelling so far in Mumbai for treatment was worthwhile once I visited the doctor. I had a bad smile due to front broken tooth and with her expertise doctor suggested the right treatment , cleared my doubt and fixed my smile.


Was very happy and satisfied with her work. Very good ambience at the clinic and good hygiene maintained. Felt comfortable taking the treatment without any hassels. I would recommend her for all your dental issues.
reply_text: Thank you Suraj for such a lovely feedback üëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had been postponing my dental treatment for years now for fear of dentist because as a kid my experience with dentist wasn't great. Finally I had to take the plunge of going to a dentist as I had developed a tooth abscess. I'm first appointment was with Dr Ritika , and she made me feel so calm and comfortable and convinced me start my treatment. I had to get couple of root canals, caps and some tooth extraction, bridges .. she went step by step making sure the treatment was pain-free. Her team is wonderful too. Finally today I walked out with a healthy mouth wit the promise that I will see her every 6 months Once again thank you Dr Ritika for getting the dental fear out So if you one of them whos scared of dentist , then you know who to visit Aesthetic smiles .. one is the best dental clinics in Mumbai

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Ritika  & her team were excellent. The attention extended along with their soft skills during the treatment made me feel comfortable & looked after. The clinic is well maintained & very clean. The results what I saw  after my treatment were far beyond my expectation. Thank You Dr Ritika & Team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent 9.9 marks out of 10  approach ,  the explanation is excellent... Technology used by the doctor is advanced

review: Excellent 9.9 marks out of 10  approach ,  the explanation is excellent... Technology used by the doctor is advanced

I was v conscious of my front  teeth as I have brown stains present since childhood. Had tried couple of dentist before n they suggested either  regular cleaning or whitening that didn't help at all...
Dr Ritika Arora explained me that these are stains present inside my teeth and will not go with regular whitening and suggested me laminate and venners.
The treatment is done very well that I not only have white teeth but also a better smile..and the most important they yet look so natural.
Please visit Dr Ritika Arora for smile designing  state of the art clinic and  amzing staff..gives a international feel yet affordable..
Thank you Dr Ritika for my KODAK SMILE

Thank doctor for giving my smile back!!!
I had a front discoloured tooth since childhood.
Was scared of dentist so never got it treated but was v concious of my smile.
Visited Dr Ritika . she convinced me the treatment will be painless .
I got a zirconia crown for my front tooth  which matches so well with my neighbouring teeth that looks v natural .
Also got my gaps closed with tooth color fillings
Highly recommend for smile designing .. V well made clinic ..must visit for all dental problems 
Will be back soon for rest of the dental work...

My front tooth had cavity and was all black. I'm v scared of dentist  that's y I never got it treated. 
Dr Ritika told me I will need root canal which got me more scared. Finally she convinced me and the treatment was done painlessly and to my surprise the root canal was completed in 45 min whereas I had heard from my friends it takes multiple sittings and is painful.
Recommend Dr Ritika especially if you scared of dental treatment, she really makes you feel comfortable and aesthetic smiles clinic has a v soothing feel unlike other clinics 
‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

I'm from LONDON and a friend recommend Dr Ritika. I was initially apprehensive to get my treatment done In India.
But after visiting her clinic , I was more than happy to get my dental treatment done here and my wife too got her treatment too.
Teeth whitening made my teeth look 2 shades whiter and with  tooth color filings you just can't make out where the decay was.
V INTERNATIONAL STANDARD CLINIC , felt I was getting my treatment done in LONDON .
friendly staff, very good ambience. *** ** ****** ** ******* ********Recommend for all who looking for international standard dental care in Mumbai

Dr Ritika Arora is a very pleasant Doctor. I had come for my wisdom tooth problem, which was explained very well how it will be removed. Her update technology at her clinic including the intra oral camera made me see all the cavities in my mouth .. Whereas I used to feel I have no cavities. V helpful too. The tooth color fillings were done absolutely painlessly and match my tooth so well that I didnt feel they was a cavity present there.
I will be coming back next week for my wisdom tooth removal and will get my family too for their dental check up with the intras oral camera.

I was always aspiring to be an air hostess but my smile was not so perfect and I had skin concerns too.
All my problems were solved after visiting Aesthetic Smiles and meeting Dr Ritika Arora 
The best part of Aesthetic Smiles was the dental and face concerns were taken care of under 1roof. 
She not only gave me a smile makeover and also introduced me to her facial aesthetic team of doctors.
Thank you Dr Prachi and Dr Jabeen Khan for taking care of my acne and acne marks.
Now I have a perfect smile and glowing skin.
Highly recommend to aspiring air hostess and models.

I came to Aesthetic Smiles with the usual fear that everyone has of dentist because of which I kept postponing my treatment. After examination I came to know I need 8 root canals and 8 crowns on them.the biggest issue for me besides the fear was the no of times I will have to come and the money I would need to shell out at one go.
The treatment was planned in such a manner that all the root canals were single sittings and the while treatment was completed in 4 / 5 visits in a span of less than 2 weeks. Not only that I was offered an EMI option too 
Thanks Dr Ritika Arora
Highly recommend to friends and family

I had been suffering from pain in wisdom tooth since couple of years and was apprehensive to remove it as everyone used to tell me it will be very painful. I came to Aesthetic Smiles with the same fear, but after meeting Dr Ritika Arora she convinced me that the tooth removal will be painkess . 
I decided to go ahead and to my surprise I didn't even realise wen the tooth was out.
Thank you Dr Ritika.
Highly recommend Aesthetic Smiles 
Sterilization is very well maintain , very neat clinic and friendly staff
Highly recommend

The clinic smelled like a sewer. It was unbearable. Dr. Ritika Arora was late for the appointment. She didn't have the courtesy to greet me or introduce herself. And she instructed me to leave my shoes in the reception. 

Not a word of apology for arriving late. No polite request to leave my shoes in the reception.  From the look (and smell) of the clinic and the unprofessionalism that was exhibited, * ***** **** **** ******* *** *** *** ****** ** *** ********** ** ** *** **** ** ******* *****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
*** **** ** *** ********* * **** **** **** ****. She does painless dental treatment, which is the best part of her üëçüèª
She is absolutely amazing in her work, and a pleasant personality.üòä

In fact Dr. Ritica  did some interdents   and caps to be done at later stage. I found her work very clean, without any discomfort. Her dexterity was appreciated. She has all modern equipment in her dental clinic aswell. I found  her better dentist than many I have visited.

Hi I'm Neha singh from Florida. I visited India mumbai to get my dental implants done from Dr Ritika. The whole treatment was painless and done well. 
Was v apprehensive about sterilisation coming from US , but Dr ritika clinic is v well maintained , would say a US standard clinic 
Highly recommend her for Dental implants 
Thanks and wish you all the best

I had come for a regular cleaning of my teeth. Dr Ritika showed me after the examination of my teeth that I have cavities too which I missed out on inspite of looking at my teeth everyday in the mirror.
The tooth color fillings were painless n blended v well with the rest of my teeth.
And the scaling and polishing made my teeth look white .what I like the most of the clinic is the pleasant ambience.and the sterilisation is given utmost importance.
Highly appreciated and recommended.

best rct treatment ever had she was soo good and polite and she always explained me before doing anything i had very good experience.
Now i dont have any pain in my tooth very good followup from doctor as well. 
In my busy schedule she use to remind me with sms  saying when exactly my next appointment is which helped me to plan my day . 
amazing ambiance

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Ritika Arora has upped the hygiene and safety protocols during Covid not limited to providing shoe covers for all patients footwear. The wait time was minimal and the patient registration process simple. The waiting area was well appointed and there was pleasant music playing. 

The cleaning was very gentle and efficient and I was in and out of there in just about 30 mins.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery & Implantology,
review:
I think Dr. Ritika is one of the most caring and supportive dentist you could find. She is an expert, relies of her expert doctors team. 

A through professional with a good mind and heart. 

She will tell you as is, explain and its transparency in the treatment process which is her forte.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor‚Äôs friendliness, patience, cooperation and to understand the problems and requirements of the Patient whether it is relating to treatment and/or the budget of the Patient.

Always friendly and ready to understand and go out of the way to help and make the Patient feel comfortable and relaxed in all aspects during the treatment and post treatment as well.

The standard of the equipment and the treatment given by Doctor Ritika was just  as as good as I have ever experienced at any clinic in Sweden. In many respects even better. *** ****** ** ********* Now I look great when I laugh and I am able to chew just about anything.

Very professional caring, goes above and beyond for her patients. Explained the process of veneers until I was satisfied.
I would recommend her to anyone uneasy about aesthetic dentistry she makes the experience enjoyable and also at your convenience. 
Keep up the amazing work!

Dr Ritika is a good doctor.
She explained the full treatment in detail which helped me get prepared for the actual work and time to be taken.
Her team is awesome and treated me very well. They use quite advanced techniques of treatment, which results in almost painless dental surgery.
I will definitely recommend her for the dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My mother was wearing a denture for years but was very unhappy as  she couldnt eat and the denture would fall out while talking.
Dr Ritika offered Dental Implants. shes now got fixed teeth thanks to her.
The whole treatment was painless. **** ****** ****** ** ****** *** ****** ********* Blessings for you from my mom for you Dr Ritika.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She is friendly .. very professional .. and very good clinical practitioner.  I went to her with swollen mouth with excruciating pain in my tooth .. she extracted my tooth which was a desperate need to do .. and I got rid of pain and also pain killers .. 
Highly recommend her to anyone .. keep following the good work.
Regards
Mohsin
Excellent experience as usual. I hv been consulting dr Arora for more than 8/9 years. She provides excellent treatments to our family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Rikita runs a clean, fully modernized practice. I was on vacation and needed urgent dental care. She was flexible with dates and times and explained all my options clearly (and her English is exceptional). She and her surgeon ended up doing several implants that I have needed for some time because her costs are so reasonable compared to the US. She didn't just hand me of to the surgeon--she stayed with me during the procedure and participated. She gave me her contact info and she followed up with me several times over the course of the next 2 days and squeezed in a follow-up visit before I left the country. Her concern was genuinely felt and it was clear I was in good hands. I'm coming back in 6 months to finish the implants process. I highly recommend her!

context: Teeth Reshaping,Ceramic Veneers / Crowns ,Teeth Whitening,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Crowns,Smile Designing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
I'm an upcoming model , wanted a new smile before I start my shoots as had bad teeth.
Got couple of root canals done which where completely painless and finished in single sitting .also had a missing g tooth which a got an implant , again painless. And last not the least got my smile designing with ceramic veners.
V satisfied with the treatment. In almost 2 weeks I have a new smile.
Will be back for my completion of my dental implant treatment
V posh clinic but v economical .
Thank you Dr Ritika

Wanted to get front caps/ bridges changed as they looked discoloured and chipped. Since they were my front teeth I was v conscious about they looking artificial and different coloir .
The ceramic caps that Dr Ritika gav me matched so well that no one can say I have artificial teeth.

context: Tooth Coloured Fillings,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
I was ignoring my teeth since long simply cz I'm scared of dental treatment.
But now after getting treated by Dr Ritika I can say dental treatment is painless. The 2 most scary things forv me was removal of wisdom tooth which was done in 10 min and no pain at all. The other was root canal which finished in single sitting in just an hour again without any pain.
Dr Ritika has a wonderful team of specialist.

I'm from Australia,  visited Dr Ritika for my gum problems. As like most of the people I was v scared for which I was postponing my gum treatment. She was v patient with me . got a minor gum surgery done which was absolutely painless. 
V nice clinic .  felt like I was in one of the clinics in Australia

I'm a model , wanted to get a smile designing as I some chipped teeth and discoloured old fillings. Dr Ritika changed my fillings and did a smile designing in the most non invasive manner simply using tooth color laser fillings .
She's a excellent cosmetic dentist. The clinic has a v nice ambience and the staff is also v friendly

I visited Dr Ritika for my children. My past experience with the dentist for my children hasn't been v good. So I came for a 2nd opinion to Dr Ritika. The way she  and her pedatric dentist Dr Suhel handled the kids was v good.they explained all the treatment v well. My kids got the treatment done v peaceful my without pain 
Visit Dr Ritika and DrSuhel for children s  dental treatment

I visited all the way from navi Mumbai as I had seen very good review s on practo and other sites too about Dr Ritika and her clinic. 
I had fractured front tooth since childhood and stains on lower front teeth.
Dr Ritika suggest d me em√†x crown for front teeth and composite veneers for lowr teeth.
The treatment gave me a new smile which was v natural .
Highly recommend Dr Ritika for all cosmetic dentl work

I had come to Dr Ritika with swelling and pain.
I was scared of removing my tooth as I thought will be painful.
Dr ritika took care of the pain and swelling and removed my teeth painlessly. I didn't even realise wen my teeth were removed
Highly Recommend her PAINLESS TOOTH REMOVAL

Visited Dr Ritika for cleaning n teeth whitening .**** *** ** ******* **** Was nice to see my teeth go 2 Shades lighter with her laser whitening treatment , n the whole procedure took only 40 min.
Highly recommend for laser teeth whitening n all other dental treatment

context: Tooth Coloured Fillings,Scaling / Polishing,Rotten Teeth,Dental Crowns,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
I got to know about Dr Ritika through nearby coupon. Visited her for a cleanup but I had so many dental issue, decided to get all sorted by her. Got my laser fillings of cavities, Root canal , dental crowns.
All painless and was done in the least sittings 
Amazing ambience, good staff.
Highly appreciated. Recommend to family friends

I had cavities in front teeth so I was v shy n conscious to smile n take my pictures. At aesthetic smiles , Dr Ritika did fillings in such a manner that they match my teeth in such a manner tat they look natural.
I'm v happy with my smile now n like taking selfies smiling ‚ò∫

I'm from Abu Dhabi . I visited Dr Ritika for fixation of my old cap and regular cleaning ..
She then showed me I need a root canal..
Pain less root canal was done that too in single sitting. And my teeth look so white after the clean up ..
Very international standard clinic well maintained and very good sterilization. 
Will be visiting soon for smile designing

context: Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
I'm terrified of dentist. Wen I came to Dr Ritika I knew I have to get a Root canal done as I already been to another dentist but couldn't gain confidence in him for my treatment. But the way Dr Ritika explained n did the treatment was absoultely painless.
The Root canal was done in single sitting and was completely painless. N in next 2 sittings my ceramic cap was fixed which looks like a natural tooth. 
Highly recommend & beautiful clinic

I was looking for a good dentist nearby. Happen to walk in Aesthetic smiles and Dr Ritika.
Got my teeth cleaning and polishing and white fillings .
Very satisfied, recommended to family and friends .
Will b back every 6 months for a check up and cleaning.

I'm came with severe tooth ache in my lower teeth. But after meeting Dr Ritika , she showed me on camera all the other tooth decay problem I had. It was reality check for me.
She also explained me all treatment options.
Pleasant clinic, very good doctor, and very convivent for people working late as the clinic is open till 9pm and starts early too. Also suits me as I can plan my longer treatment s on Sundays as she works on Sunday too by prior appointments

context: Implant Prosthesis,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,
review:
I visited aesthetic smiles clinic & got my tooth removal and dental implant work done from Dr Ritika Arora. Fabulous work she done for me, every procedures was painless, very satisfied with her work.
I m very scared of dentist and dental chair...but she made be feel so comfortable tat the fear is all gone and now I'll be coming back for my cosmetic dental treatment.
I highly recommend Dr Ritika and Dental implants is the best tooth replacement option.

I visited aesthetic smiles clinic for the first time. I was searching a good dentist in khar & I found aesthetic smiles clinic, such a nic clinic the doctor is very genuine & friendly. I got my check-up & teeth cleaning done surely I'll visit for my cavity filling & other work! Highly recommend

I visited Aesthetic Smiles clinic to get my teeth alignment treatment done. I met Dr Ritika Arora she diagnosed me & suggested me a ortho treatment its been only 2 or 3 month  but I can see the difference already. Happy with the treatment m getting done ‚ò∫

I didnt go for the treatment, since I wanted to know about the prices and worst part is that She is charging exorbitant prices which comes to around 10,000 and 14000 for Zirconia Crowns.

Doesn't seems that these doctors think before putting up such a heavy price tagline to suck the hard earned money.I do appreciate that she made me acquainted with all the other things on how RCT is done and what types of crown are available in market.

I had my daughter tanvi for dental treatment, she's very scared of dentist but Dr Ritika handled her very well. And removed my daughters teeth and did her fillings too. She is like to visit Dr Ritika now with a smiling face, Dr Ritika is a good paedritic dentist too.

I had got my mother for tooth extraction. I was very apprehensive as I myself scared of dentist and definitely cannot see my mother in pain. Her tooth extraction was done abouslety pain free by Dr Ritika and my mother didn't get any pain or swelling after that.

reply_text: Hi Mr Deepak,  i fully understand your concern. Sir i had explained you that you have a deep cavity and a filling will not help ,also had explained your sensitivity might increase after the filling,  it would eventually require a root Canal which i think you weren't ready for. A filling would was only a 50 % chance which you wanted to take. Yet we are ready to resolve your problem, please  let me know when u would like to visit us. Me and my team dont like to keep any of our patients dis satisfied.
